CustomField.formula: IF(NOT(ISNULL(Main_Organization_Name__c )) && NOT(ISBLANK(Main_Organization_Name__c )), Main_Organization_Name__c +' ' , '')+IF(NOT(ISNULL(Trading_Organization_Name__c )) && NOT(ISBLANK(Trading_Organization_Name__c )), Trading_Organization_Name__c +' ' , '')+IF(NOT(ISNULL(Business_Organization_Name__c )) && NOT(ISBLANK(Business_Organization_Name__c )), Business_Organization_Name__c +' ' , '')+IF(NOT(ISNULL(Other_Trading_Organization_Name__c )) && NOT(ISBLANK(Other_Trading_Organization_Name__c )), Other_Trading_Organization_Name__c , '')+IF(NOT(ISNULL(Legal_FullName__c)) && NOT(ISBLANK(Legal_FullName__c)), Legal_FullName__c+' ' , '')
CustomField.label: Name
